org.apache.kafka.streams.errors

Interface DeserializationExceptionHandler

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Configurable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LogAndContinueExceptionHandler, LogAndFailExceptionHandler

    public interface DeserializationExceptionHandler
extends Configurable
    Interface that specifies how an exception from source node deserialization (e.g., reading from Kafka) should be handled.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DeserializationExceptionHandler.DeserializationHandlerResponse
      Enumeration that describes the response from the exception handler.

    • Method Summary

      DeserializationExceptionHandler.DeserializationHandlerResponse handle(ProcessorContext context, ConsumerRecord<byte[],byte[]> record, java.lang.Exception exception)
      Inspect a record and the exception received.

        configure

                                                                      ConsumerRecord<byte[],byte[]> record,

        Inspect a record and the exception received.
        Parameters:
